dt.t: I am writing up this part of the diary {wi}whilst{/wi} I am waiting for the coach …
… wisely decided to hold my peace, {wi}whilst{/wi} Cynthia exhausted every possible hypothesis …
… the chief difference between the {ldquo}employed{rdquo} and {ldquo}self-employed{rdquo} categories being that the former may enjoy unemployment benefit {wi}whilst{/wi} the latter may not.
